TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to update and exchange the Sub-Type information of a Unit Message Element in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates a Unit message element with a specific Sub-Type. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the Sub-Type of the Unit. Nation B receives and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updated Sub-Type of the Unit is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a message element for a Unit with Sub-Type InfantryUnit.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Unit correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the Sub-Type for this Unit to ReconnaissanceUnit.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Unit with the new Sub-Type correctly.
